text: Lords with greater power enjoy larger estates, more slaves, and a status closer to the Witch King's Black Tower!
Dark Dealings
Tempered by years of thunderstorms, the Aspen Spirit possesses a silver-forged body and extraordinary vitality, channeling terrifying lightning to pierce through armor and flesh alike.
No matter when winter retreats, the steadfast Birch Spirit silently guards Athel Loren, awaiting the rebirth of slumbering life from the ashes.
Even the fiercest flames cannot destroy the ancient Oak Spirit, having endured countless seasons. Ancient waystone spirits constantly remind it of its duties.
The Willow Spirit heralds spring, embodies life, and serves as the resting place for lost souls. It supports the Wood Elves and Forest Spirits against the harshest of environments.
The forest's malice spawns these cold-hearted malicious beings. Graceful like perfect dancers, their twisted branches excel at piercing hearts from the shadows.

Stance: Waylaying Raiders
Traversing the world by passing through normally inaccessible regions.
Stance: Transdimensional Travel
Due to the missing chapters of the Portal Stone, nearby enemies may sense the turbulence in the Winds of Magic and intercept this army.
Allows movement through normally inaccessible regions.
